formattedAddress: 342 Pleasant Ave, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 342 Pleasant Ave, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text: Driving through the city and came across this place on Halloween. It was a very nice place and my daughter enjoyed the experience. We saw a bunny and some chickens in a beautiful garden.

text.text: Driving through the city and came across this place on Halloween. It was a very nice place and my daughter enjoyed the experience. We saw a bunny and some chickens in a beautiful garden.

originalText.text:
A great place to get to know your friendly neighborhood gardeners and volunteers.I just joined this year and help take care of our 6 chickens. Lots of little spots to sit in the sun or in the shade and just enjoy the peace and quiet. A nice respite from urban life.

Unfortunately,  the garden might lose part of our land, the best part on the southern side,  that allows the sun to come through and where the chickens and composting are located. HPD wants to use it to develop a residential building, which will be very detrimental to our garden operations. Please alert your council and community representatives and tell them to help us fight to keep it.

originalText.text: Very nice and calm place. You can enjoy a nice lunch in there.

text.text: Very nice and calm place. You can enjoy a nice lunch in there.

originalText.text: Quiet oasis garden in East Village. Chickens and much more.

text.text: Quiet oasis garden in East Village. Chickens and much more.

originalText.text: I definitely love this place is quiet it's beautiful it's like make sure you're going there you feel like doing nature even though the street is right next to it it's a lot of traffic but as soon as you go in there it's like you forget this car is out there going and coming all the way especially I like it because of the alcapurrias and the Spanish food is so good I love the alcapurrias first of all and then I can say I love the rice with gandules also the people is great I mean the lady that cooks the two ladies they cook the two young men that they're in the front they are awesome they are pleasant they're always are welcoming you every time they see you even though you pass by and you don't go in there they just hi hello hola como estas it is a great place to be I give this a five if it has a 10 I will give it a 10 because they make you feel so good I can I win once I passed by we were we went to shopping looking for Target and we pass by in as soon as we pass by the rain or else they will say hello how you doing como estas really great people and then we just went in to just try it and then I fell in love with it it's great I love it forgive me if I don't remember your name I know my husband remembers you this great man that always so happy with a smile when he talks to you and makes you feel so comfortable and you always ask what you need if you need anything else if you want this bathroom this this daddy make you feel so great and I love it I love it a great people I love them the park is great but no mejor es la Gente que esta ahi
